name: echoesofeldoria
description: # admin initializes offset account(init_current_feed) # offset account can be initialized only once # admin can update fee for random number derivation,  # admin can update feed accounts and fall back account( update_current_feed ) # admin initilizes config account (init_config) # init_config can be called only once # admin can update the authrorized admins ( set_config ) # user updates offsets as they call rng program (randomize) # rng program returns a random number to be used in the same transaction
